TopicTitle: [AAR] The Grand Tour - Voyage To The Planets

Articles.Content: I have been following this for MONTHS now, and I must say, its an AMAZINGLY good story!
I have a feeling that this is soon coming to an end. On the other hand I expect the Grand tour part to be fulfilled. Looking forward to the next installation of this incredibly amazing story.

I have been following this for MONTHS now, and I must say, its an AMAZINGLY good story!

Thanks You really have been lurking for months?

I have a feeling that this is soon coming to an end. On the other hand I expect the Grand tour part to be fulfilled.

Define "soon"

Looking forward to the next installation of this incredibly amazing story.

You mean like a sequel?

Another sneak-peak photo:

And if anyone is interested in supporting me getting Imgur premium account:

Take care folks
Can't Wait Man Have some Jool Sized Expectations for the next chapter

[PICTURE]

Ah, I have been wondering what has been happening on Laythe while all this chaos went on above them - and this looks like we might find out

Ah, I have been wondering what has been happening on Laythe while all this chaos went on above them - and this looks like we might find out

:dun dun dun:

In the meantime if you are hungry for moar stories written by me, you can read

Crusader Kings II AAR "This Is Madness - Story Of The Crumbling Europe"

Be warned though, it's completely different from Grand Tour and Space Race - no science-fiction! Well, apart from Aztecs conquering the Western Europe. But at least the grimdark levels are high

Dayum, man

Before the next chapter release (which I plan in the next several dozen hours) I advise everyone who didn't yet do this to watch this awesome mini TV-series about mission to Mars, probably the most scientifically accurate hard s-f ever made for television.

There are some silly things of course but hey, compare it to any other movie with Mars made by Hollywood - even with low budget and some quirks (dat canadarms!) it beats crap like "Red Planet" or "Mission to Mars" without any problems. And AT LAST there are no military hot-shots, crazy scientists with Russian accent, cold seargants, hot Mrs. Captain or any other overused s-f cliche. As a matter of fact, I think that the writers were so Genre Savvy that thay intentionally subverted every major s-f trope there is

Edited January 20, 2014 by czokletmuss
Wow Czokletemuss, it's Soon, not Soontm?
I'm even willing to say it's Very Soon

I'm even willing to say it's Very Soon

Oh boy oh boy oh boy
your soon is still to long
Damn you, czoklettmuss... I had to watch that whole damn movie at once, it was so good! *shakes fist*
And you can *hear* the tension.
This is starting to remind me of 2001: A Space Odyssey...

Wow...

Just, wow...

I was wandering in the forum as i am noob, about 1 week and half ago, trying to find information and inspiration for my new ships in KSP and then i found this...

Czokletmuss, i just hate u... this story u're writing absorbed all my free time, second by second, burn by burn, since then. I'm serious... From prologue 1, to Daisy and also all Kadmos story, i wasn't able to stop.

I just stopped to read only because there isn't nothing left to read.

And now, that i flyied with Kadmos and Proteus, i hate u, because i feel that coming back to designing vanilla ships in KSP is absolutedly boring, because aside of the planets, what u have and describe in your story isn't actually the same in the game... Now i HAVE to try it with all the mods u have and the only one i have now is engineer redux! KOD DAMMIT, CZOKLETMUSS! FRAK U!

Jokes apart:

U're great man! u made my fun in this days, i stopped to play everygame to read your story, i really enjoyed it.

U made such great work! For the writing, for the story, for the engineering of ALL the ultra cool ships u builded for it (that i didn't know that could be possible to build), the amazing Proteus and the really cool and numerous Kerbal acting images with which u tell us the story u invented. And also obviously for your time and dedication.

I found it fun that some things are from films and literature, like Sunshine themes and Asimoov tree laws, but i really think they fit a lot into it. Also with a whole bunch of Kerbality mixed to them. If u will continue it to the end, u'll be sure that u will have at least one reader here for sure.

Keep up the awesome work, i'll be there for chapter 54 and, well, thanks for all.

P.S. Can't u pass me the list of the mods u used? i'm excited as hell to try them all, but i don't know if i'm able to find them...

Kodspeed

Key
